statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_analysis WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_analysis WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_analysis WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_analysis WHERE satisfaction_score BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT * FROM feedback_analysis WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC, feedback_text ASC
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_analysis WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_analysis WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM feedback_analysis GROUP BY satisfaction_score HAVING AVG(satisfaction_score) > 3
SELECT customer_id, SUM(satisfaction_score) AS total_score FROM feedback_analysis GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_score > 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 50;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM feedback_data JOIN customer_info ON feedback_data.customer_id = customer_info.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_details
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_details
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id=1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM customers_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_id FROM customer_satisfaction_scores WHERE satisfaction_score < 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_info FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM ImprovementInitiatives WHERE impact_on_score > 5.0;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM SatisfactionScores ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_info FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_score FROM Customers ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM SatisfactionScores WHERE satisfaction_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description, impact_on_score FROM ImprovementInitiatives WHERE impact_on_score < 0 ORDER BY initiative_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, category_id FROM feedback_mapping WHERE feedback_id IN (1,2,3);
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_score FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT f.feedback_text, c.category_name FROM customer_feedback f JOIN feedback_mapping fm ON f.feedback_id = fm.feedback_id JOIN feedback_categories c ON fm.category_id = c.category_id;

SELECT fs.score_value, fc.category_name FROM satisfaction_scores fs JOIN feedback_mapping fm ON fs.feedback_id = fm.feedback_id JOIN feedback_categories fc ON fm.category_id = fc.category_id ORDER BY fs.score_value DESC;
